items.name: Garlic Bread Supreme
items.description: Toasted artisan bread with garlic butter, mozzarella, and herbs.

items.name: Spicy Wings
items.description: Chicken wings tossed in our signature spicy sauce, served with blue cheese dip.

items.name: Classic Cheeseburger
items.description: Beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and special sauce on a sesame bun. Served with fries.

items.name: Vegan Pasta Primavera
items.description: Penne pasta with fresh seasonal vegetables in a light tomato and herb sauce.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
